text: tavada “mage deviyane! mava (madinavehi ætulu kala yutuya yayi oba adahas kalahot) honda andaminma ætulu vimata salasvanu (mænava!) (makkave sita mava pitamam kala yutuya yayi oba adahas kalahot) honda andaminma mava pitat vannata salasvanu (mænava!) oba sannidhanaye æti jayagrahanayak oba ma hata udavvak vasayen laba denu mænava!” yayi (nabiye!) oba prarthana karanu mænava
